sentences.en: And then we embed data by modifying distribution of each division.
sentences.cn: 然后,透过调整区间中各个像素的分布来达到藏匿浮水印的工作.

sentences.en: At the bottom of this structure we embed constants into operators which terminate the nesting process.
sentences.cn: 这一结构的底端,我们将常数插入了用于终止嵌套过程的操作数.

sentences.en: Create your own slideshow, then embed in your classroom blog.
sentences.cn: 创建自己的幻灯片, 然后嵌入到教学博客中.

sentences.en: Embed characters in use only ( best for reducing file size )
sentences.cn: 只嵌入所用字符 ( 适于减少文件大小 )

sentences.en: Feelings of guilt are deeply embedded in her personality.
sentences.cn: 负罪感在她的性格里根深蒂固。

sentences.en: For example, some websites embed video players, games, and other interactive experiences on site pages.
sentences.cn: 比如, 有的网站中嵌入视频播放器, 游戏和其他交互体验上的网页.

sentences.en: Furthermore, it can embed a multi - lever gray image .
sentences.cn: 此外, 该算法能够用于多 灰度级图像 水印的嵌入.

sentences.en: How to embed this virtual tour in my web page?
sentences.cn: 如何嵌入这个虚拟游览我的网页?

sentences.en: Many toxic securities are complex and embed fraud.
sentences.cn: 许多有毒证券非常复杂,而且存在欺诈行为.

sentences.en: My dear " duckling ", do you still embed in mind the dream of " white swan "?
sentences.cn: 亲爱的 “ 小鸭子 ”, 还在做 “ 白天鹅 ” 的梦 吗 ?

sentences.en: One of the bullets passed through Andrea's chest before embedding itself in a wall.
sentences.cn: 其中一颗子弹穿过安德烈亚的胸膛然后嵌入一面墙中。

sentences.en: Select to embed or link items into documents for users to edit directly.
sentences.cn: 选择将项嵌入或链接至文档内以便于用户直接编辑.

sentences.en: Specifies whether to embed tracking information in the assembly.
sentences.cn: 指定是否在程序集中嵌入跟踪信息.

sentences.en: The basic idea is to embed a watermark by adding an echo the original sample.
sentences.cn: 基本思想是嵌入水印添加回声原始样本.

sentences.en: They used to kind of embed it in the glass.
sentences.cn: 他们往往把它嵌在玻璃里.

sentences.en: This photo showed us how did the root of plant embed the soil deeply.
sentences.cn: 这张照片显示植物的根是如何深入到土壤里去的.

sentences.en: We will help you apply and embed your new skills and behaviours during the programme.
sentences.cn: 我们会通过这个课程帮你应用并且深化你的新技巧和行为.

phrases.tran_cn: 嵌入水印；嵌入水印滤镜

trans.tran_en: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way

trans.tran_cn: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留于脑中
trans.tran_en: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way
